page.description: Reset the contents of the TableInfo as if it had just been declared.
page.original:
SQL::TableInfo::Clear() Syntax Result_Flag as L = .Clear() ArgumentDescription Result_FlagTRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.). A SQL::TableInfo object.
Description The Clear() method clears out the SQL::TableInfo object as if it had just been created. Example dim TableInfo as SQL::TableInfo TableInfo.Name = "MyTable" IndexInfo.Name = "Primary_Key" TableInfo.Clear() ? TableInfo.Name = ""
See Also SQL::TableInfo Object Limitations
